segments.text: Hello , I need a wake-up call tomorrow morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . When would you like the call ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , I need two calls , one at 7 and the other at 7 fifteen .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem . We'll give you both calls .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you know what , let's change the second call to 7 thirty .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not at the moment , thank you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me know if you do need anything .
segments.speaker: S2
